## Type of Change

- [ ] **Skill** - adds a new skill in `skills/`
- [ ] **Fix** - bug fix or security fix to source code
- [ ] **Simplification** - reduces or simplifies source code
- [ ] **Release** - version, changelog, or release-process changes

## Description


## For Skills

- [ ] I have not made any changes to source code
- [ ] My skill contains instructions for the agent to follow (not pre-built code)
- [ ] I tested this skill on a fresh clone

## Release Hygiene

- [ ] I updated `CHANGELOG.md` (or explicitly confirmed no release-impacting changes)
